result.execSummary:
The defendant Nelson Chavez Solis was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operate w/o Valid License(3rd+ w/in3Yrs), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.05(3)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Total fines and costs in the amount of $579 to be payed by payment plan at a rate of $50 per month beginning October 1st, 2016 and to be payed on the first of each month thereafter.  Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment being entered in the amount of the unpaid balance.
Defendant to submit a DNA sample.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Nelson Chavez Solis in court with attorney Marc Efton Christopher.  Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Interpreter, John Vaugh, present in court.  Interpreter sworn.  Counsel submits plea questionnaire and waiver.  Court examines the defendant as to the waiver.  Defendant enters a Guilty plea.  Court accepts the plea, finding it to be free and voluntary, and finds the defendant guilty as to their plea.  State makes recommendation as to sentencing.  Court renders judgment.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 12, 2016 at 02:30 pm.

Court interpreter-Vicki Bermudez / Defendant Nelson Chavez Solis in court with attorney Eloisa De Leon.  Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty. De Leon stated parties are close to resolution but needs to review additional discovery. Bail to continue.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 12, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Further proceedings on July 19, 2016 at 08:00 am.

Court interpreter John Vaughn / Defendant Nelson Chavez Solis in court with attorney Eloisa De Leon.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty. DeLeon requests a July court date, received an offer.  Further proceedings scheduled for July 19, 2016 at 08:00 am.
with conditions of   Defendant shall not operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.  Court orders absolute sobriety.  No possession/consumption of any intoxicants.
Further proceedings on June 21, 2016 at 08:00 am.

Defendant Nelson Chavez Solis in court with attorney Eloisa DeLeon on behalf of attorney Marc Efton Christopher.  Shannon M. Whitworth appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court Interpreter John Vaughn.  Court reviews charges and penalties.  Counsel acknowledges receipt of the criminal complaint and enters a Not Guilty Plea.  State recommends signature bond.  Court orders $500 signature bond with conditions.  Further proceedings scheduled for June 21, 2016 at 08:00 am.
Further proceedings on April 19, 2016 at 09:30 am.
Due to calendar conflict, time of hearing changed to 9:30 am. Notice mailed.

Defendant Nelson Chavez Solis in court with Attorney Eloisa Deleon appearing on behalf of Attorney Marc Efton Christopher.  Patti l Wabitsch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Counsel enters plea of not guilty and states need of interpreter court. State requests 2015TR4316 and 2015TR4317 track with the criminal matter.
Court grants request for traffic matters to track with criminal matter, will transfer cases to specialty court and will leave bail pending until next court date.
Further proceedings scheduled for April 19, 2016 at 08:00 am.
Call with Atty Efton requesting adjournment of 2/3/16 hearing due to scheduling conflict. Clerk reset to 2/11/16 at 9:15am. Notices mailed.
